channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dear Secretary Kennedy: Please Stop Schools From Needlessly Drugging Kids
item.description: I hope Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and the new Make America Healthy Again Commission won’t need prescription stimulants to notice this crisis.

item.title: Group of Venezuelans sue Trump admin for temporary immigration protections
item.description: A group of migrants are suing the Trump administration for ending the Temporary Protected Status (TPS) for more than 600,000 Venezuelans, claiming the...

item.title: If Anything, J.D. Vance Was Polite To Europe
item.description: It's hypocritical to rally the free world around defending democracy if Western democracies themselves abandon democratic values.

item.title: The Week: Ukraine Gets Shut Out from Peace Talks and Slammed by U.S.
item.description: Plus: With inflation still persisting, the Fed would be wrong to cut interest rates further.

item.title: AG Bondi says violent anti-Israel student protesters in US on visas 'need to be kicked out'
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi said at CPAC on Thursday that anti-Israel protesters in the United States on visas "need to be kicked out of this country."

item.title: Attorney General Pushes Indiana Supreme Court To End Lawfare Targeting Pro-Life Speech
item.description: Since 2020, hundreds of Republican attorneys have faced challenges to their law licenses for making conservative arguments in court.

item.title: MrBeast says built his $700m YouTube empire on the ‘purple cow effect’
item.description: MrBeast, aka Jimmy Donaldson, has cracked the code for YouTube stardom—but says his success won't be easy to replicate.

item.title: Hollywood Can’t Handle Hard Truths
item.description: Marianne Jean-Baptiste’s performance is too reel and too real.

item.title: The Eric Adams Mess
item.description: The Trump DOJ has been a poor steward of prosecutorial power in the case, but the Constitution grants the executive such power.

item.title: 'I want to find out': Trump says he is going to personally inspect the gold at Fort Knox

item.title: Jensen Huang says investors got it wrong over DeepSeek stock sell off that wiped $600bn from Nvidia
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has addressed a market selloff that wiped $600 billion off his company—and caused his personal wealth to plummet.

item.title: Trump Media board approves an investment fund to explore acquisitions
item.description: Trump Media wants to add more businesses in what it calls the “America First Economy,” according to an SEC filing.

item.title: Ukraine Never Should Have Made the Mistake of Getting Invaded
item.description: Realpolitik is one thing; needlessly insulting an ally and condemning it in perversely moralizing terms is another.

item.title: What Is the Future of Investing? Augmented Intelligence

item.title: Will Walmart Be a Leader in Abandoning Corporate Wokeness?

item.title: Decoding PE Buyouts: The Full Financial Picture is in the Consolidated Accounts
item.description: As the PE landscape evolves, investment professionals must understand how to correctly capture the full picture of a portfolio company’s performance.

item.title: Your ‘Farm Fresh’ Produce Might Be Fertilized With Forever Chemicals And Human Waste
item.description: Some farms avoid expensive commercial fertilizers by using free treated human sewage, which can contain anything that goes down a sewer.

item.title: Trudeau zings Trump after Canada beats U.S. in 4 Nations Face-Off

item.title: Women and Finance: How Embracing Risk Can Unlock Greater Success
item.description: The key to embracing risk? Balance prudence with action, preparation with confidence, and strategy with boldness.

item.title: White House protector and most decorated K-9 in US history dies: 'a very good boy'
item.description: Hurricane, a former Secret Service dog who is recognized as the most decorated K-9 in U.S. history, has died at the age of 15.

item.title: Tesla recalls more than 375,000 vehicles due to power steering issue
item.description: The loss of power could require more effort to control the car by drivers, particularly at low speeds, increasing the risk of a crash.

item.title: Caesars Palace, MLB stadium, an ice cream truck: DOGE reveals how schools spent billions in COVID-relief funds
item.description: Schools spent nearly $200 billion of COVID-relief dollars on expenses that had "little" impact on students, DOGE said.

item.title: JFK Library shuts down due to Trump firings, then reopens
